results.title: Association of metformin use with risk of newly onset neovascular age-related macular degeneration development.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: To investigate if @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use reduces the odds of developing new @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@neovascular AMD@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@nAMD@@@).

citations.NLM: Khanna S, Shaw L, Hyman MJ, Zhang J, Hariprasad S, Soo J, Flores A, Skondra D. Association of metformin use with risk of newly onset neovascular age-related macular degeneration development. Retina. 2023 Oct 30;():. PMID: 38408173

results.title: ASSOCIATION OF METFORMIN USE WITH RISK OF NEWLY ONSET NEOVASCULAR AGE-RELATED MACULAR DEGENERATION DEVELOPMENT.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: To investigate if @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use reduces the odds of developing new @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@neovascular AMD@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@nAMD@@@).

results.title: Intravitreal Metformin Protects Against Choroidal Neovascularization and Light-Induced Retinal Degeneration.
results.text_hl: Current treatments relying on intravitreal (IVT) administration of anti-angiogenic agents are costly and of moderate effectiveness. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, the common anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug, has been associated with decreased odds of developing @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@AMD@@@.

citations.NLM: Xiao JF, Luo W, Mani A, Barba H, Solanki A, Droho S, Lavine JA, Skondra D. Intravitreal Metformin Protects Against Choroidal Neovascularization and Light-Induced Retinal Degeneration. Int J Mol Sci. 2024 Oct 22;25(21):. PMID: 39518910

results.title: Repurposing Drugs for Treatment of Age-Related Macular Degeneration.
results.text_hl: A promising approach is repurposing of FDA-approved medications to treat @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@AMD@@@. Databases containing medical and drug records allow for retroactive identification of drugs whose use correlates with reduced @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@AMD@@@ diagnosis.

citations.NLM: Francisco SG, Rowan S. Repurposing Drugs for Treatment of Age-Related Macular Degeneration. Adv Exp Med Biol. 2023;1415():73-77. PMID: 37440017
citations.BibTeX: @article{37440017, title={Repurposing Drugs for Treatment of Age-Related Macular Degeneration.}, author={Francisco SG and Rowan S}, journal={Adv Exp Med Biol}, volume={1415}, pages={73-77}}

results.title: The Common Antidiabetic Drug Metformin Reduces Odds of Developing Age-Related Macular Degeneration
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ who had taken @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had decreased odds of developing @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@AMD@@@, suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may have a therapeutic role in @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@AMD@@@ development or progression in those who are at risk.

citations.NLM: Brown EE, Ball JD, Chen Z, Khurshid GS, Prosperi M, Ash JD. The Common Antidiabetic Drug Metformin Reduces Odds of Developing Age-Related Macular Degeneration Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci. 2019 Apr 1;60(5):1470-1477. PMID: 30973575

results.title: [Study on the anti-Lewis lung carcinoma effect of metformin combined with MCT1 inhibitor CHC].
results.journal: Sichuan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: METHODS: In vitro, the utilization of lactate acid was measured by @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ assay in cultured medium and the inhibition of @CELLLINE_CVCL:C4DW @@@LL/2@@@ cell proliferation of four groups [control group, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (1 mmol/L and 5 mmol/L), @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@CHC@@@ group (5 mmol/L) and the combination group (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 5 mmol/L and @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@CHC@@@ 5 mmol/L)] was detected in 24 h, 48 h, and their apoptosis in 24 h was also detected.

citations.NLM: Guo FC, Wang LQ, Zhang J, Wang YS. [Study on the anti-Lewis lung carcinoma effect of metformin combined with MCT1 inhibitor CHC]. Sichuan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban. 2013 May;44(3):375-8. PMID: 23898516
